summary: Implemented favicon link tags, JSON-LD structured data, SPA fallback exclusions, and ICP asset header/cache rules for favicon requests. However, the diff does not show the actual favicon image/icon files being added to frontend/public, and several unrelated UI/SEO/verification and app-behavior changes were made beyond the favicon-only scope. Production redeploy/verification cannot be confirmed from code changes alone.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add favicon assets derived from the existing Sangharsh Classes logo and publish them at the site root via frontend/public/favicon.png and frontend/public/favicon.ico (or document shipping only PNG).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows references and hosting rules for favicon.png/favicon.ico, but does not show the favicon files themselves being added under frontend/public/. No added files are listed, and no file content for favicon assets is shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Structured data must not introduce new product features or marketing claims beyond identifying the site/organization and logo.
missing_requirements.reason: The Organization JSON-LD includes a promotional/marketing description ("Expert coaching... 100% result-oriented approach"), which appears to go beyond pure identification + logo reference as constrained by the requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Redeploy the site and verify in production that favicon URLs return 200 with correct image/icon content and are not rewritten/cached incorrectly.
missing_requirements.reason: Redeploying and production verification are operational steps; no evidence of a production check (HTTP 200/image content validation) can be confirmed from the diff summary.
evidence: File diff summary (no deployment/prod verification output included)

hallucinated_features.description: Major redesign/content changes to multiple frontend sections (Header/Hero/About/Faculty/Courses/Contact/Footer), adding new marketing copy, layouts, animations, and static content unrelated to favicon/logo fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly restricts changes to favicon/logo assets, <head> tags/metadata, and hosting rules; UI/theme/layout changes are non-goals.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for frontend/src/components/Header.tsx, Hero.tsx, About.tsx, Faculty.tsx, Courses.tsx, Contact.tsx, Footer.tsx, WhatsAppButton.tsx, frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx, frontend/src/index.css, frontend/tailwind.config.js)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified app runtime behavior such as runtime diagnostics, SEO guards for domain canonicalization, error boundary wrapping, and React Query/actor recovery logic changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest non-goals include changing backend logic/user/auth features and constraints focus only on favicon/metadata/hosting rules.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Google Search Console verification file (google53082ab74af04c28.html).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the favicon/logo fix requirements and goes beyond favicon/head/hosting rules needed specifically to serve the favicon correctly.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a deployment checklist document focused on blank-screen regressions and general deployment validation.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; while tangentially related to deployment, REQ-5 asks to redeploy/verify production behavior, not to add new documentation.
